name: Systematic Immunity
description: Systematic Immunity is a challenging precision platformer set inside the human body...and not a particularly healthy one either. This body has been infected by a big, nasty bugger of a germ, who is making it his business to spawn many more germs as fast as he can.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windoes Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 3Ghz Dual Core Prcessor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 and Shader Model 3.0 graphics support DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game is alot of fun at first when i got the game there were no videos on it so figureing out how certian things worked was hard but soon i figured out how you stick on things but anyways in my opinion i give it a 10/10
